March 26, 1937 D East Anglian BBA Spring Festival (Section 2)
East Anglian BBA Spring Festival (Section 2) 510 Test Piece Contest East Anglian BBA Spring Festival east-anglian-bba-section-2
None
Test Piece Contest
Titus
Guild Hall, Cambridge Contest limited to 20 players
Brass Band News April 1937 shows result as - 1. Heacham, 2. Dereham, 3, New Buckenham., May edition states Heacham were later disqualified and that Wicken were second. (dutchy) 5 bands competed.
March 13, 2017, 9:47 a.m. Aug. 18, 2020, 2:58 p.m.
1 Dereham Band G. H. Slaughter
2 Wicken Coronation Band Fred Talbot
3 New Buckenham Silver Band W. A. Emms
4 March Town C. J. Smith
Disqualified Heacham and District G. J. Holland
Withdrawn Chatteris Town Brass Unknown
Withdrawn Littleport Brass R. Dent
